(1,): As a system administrator, I want to process deletions from 12-19-2017, so that outdated transaction data is removed from the database As a data engineer, I want to sync D1 file generation with FPDS data load, so that reports are always up-to-date As a data steward, I want to derive FundingAgencyCode, so that data quality is improved As a data mapper, I want to map FederalActionObligation to Atom Feed, so that financial data is properly represented As a data consumer, I want to get published FABS files, so that I can access the latest data As a data analyst, I want to filter to grant records only, so that I can focus on grant-related data As a data formatter, I want to ensure zero-padded fields, so that data formats are consistent As a data updater, I want to update FABS sample files, so that examples reflect current formats As a data loader, I want to derive fields for historical FABS data, so that records are complete As a data processor, I want to add FREC derivations to historical FABS data, so that agency codes are standardized As a data loader, I want to load both historical and FPDS feed data, so that systems have complete datasets As a group manager, I want to create FABS groups under FREC paradigm, so that data is organized effectively As a data validator, I want to validate historical data columns, so that all necessary information is present As a data extractor, I want to access additional fields from FPDS data, so that more details are available As a data loader, I want to load all FPDS data since 2007, so that historical analysis is possible
